org.apache.poi.hssf.record
Class SaveRecalcRecord

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.poi.hssf.record.Record
      org.apache.poi.hssf.record.SaveRecalcRecord

public class SaveRecalcRecord
extends Record

Title: Save Recalc Record

Description: defines whether to recalculate before saving (set to true)

REFERENCE: PG 381 Microsoft Excel 97 Developer's Kit (ISBN: 1-57231-498-2)

Version:
2.0-pre
Author:
Andrew C. Oliver (acoliver at apache dot org), Jason Height (jheight at chariot dot net dot au)

Constructor Detail

SaveRecalcRecord

public SaveRecalcRecord()

SaveRecalcRecord

public SaveRecalcRecord(RecordInputStream in)
Constructs an SaveRecalc record and sets its fields appropriately.

Parameters:
id - id must be 0x5f or an exception will be throw upon validation
size - the size of the data area of the record
data - data of the record (should not contain sid/len)
